scripts.build: REACT_APP_ENVIRONMENT=mainnet react-scripts build && rm build/static/*/*.map && cp -r -f build/* ../express/public/
scripts.buildlocal: REACT_APP_ENVIRONMENT=localnet react-scripts build && rm build/static/*/*.map && cp -r -f build/* ../express/public/
scripts.builddocker: REACT_APP_ENVIRONMENT=mainnet react-scripts build && rm build/static/*/*.map && mkdir -p ../express/public && cp -r -f build/* ../express/public/
